room_title: Escape room "The Toymaker" by Escape Games Riverside in Redlands
room_description:
Klaus MÃ¼ller longs to join the ranks of the world's greatest toy-makers. Unfortunately, his life's work amounts to a long list of toys that are cast aside by children after just minutes of play. His repeated failures have brought Klaus close to breaking... or has he broken already?
Klaus has invited you to come see his latest inventions at his workshop, but he may have something else in store for you...
